scripts.clean-e2e-projects: git checkout e2e-projects/ && git clean -f e2e-projects/
scripts.build: npm --workspaces --if-present run build && npm --workspaces --if-present run test
scripts.build-essential: npm --workspace @slicemachine/plugin-kit run build && npm --workspace @slicemachine/manager run build
scripts.test:e2e: npm run cypress-setup && start-server-and-test 'npm run dev --prefix e2e-projects/cypress-next-app' http://localhost:3000 'SM_ENV=development ENABLE_SENTRY=false npm run slicemachine --prefix e2e-projects/cypress-next-app' http://localhost:9999 'cypress run'
scripts.test:e2e:dev: npm run cypress-setup && start-server-and-test 'npm run dev --prefix e2e-projects/cypress-next-app' http://localhost:3000 'SM_ENV=development ENABLE_SENTRY=false npm run slicemachine --prefix e2e-projects/cypress-next-app' http://localhost:9999 'cypress open'
scripts.::changeset: npm run changeset add && git add .changeset && git commit -m '[release:changelog] update changeset'; echo 'We commited your changeset. You should defo push this master ✌️'
scripts.::release: manypkg check && npm run build && lerna publish && npm run run changeset
